name: ServerProtect
body:
ServerProtect



Installation

Download the plugin. Put in plugins folder. Reload or restart server. Configure it to your liking. Done.

Download

Download v2.1
Every now and then I'll upload development builds. These will probably be very buggy, but useful for testing and fixing bugs if you come across them. Development builds will always be a completely different link, so you don't have to use them.

Bugs

If you find a bug, shortcoming, defect, or you just want to make a suggestion, submit a ticket on the BukkitDev page here.

Donate

Donating is by no means necessary nor will it earn you anything special or a 'full' version. It is however a nice way of saying thanks for developing this plugin. If you feel kind enough to donate, click the image below:

All other information can be found on the repository ReadMe or the BukkitDev page
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
